name: Royal Romances Episode 2 - F2P
description:
“Fate of the Woods” is the new episode of the great magical story of the “Royal Romances” puzzle games series! Put all the fantasy puzzles together as you travel along with the characters, make decisions that affect the plot of the quest, complete the mini-games and riddles, and find out how the next episode ends! Not only will adventure hidden object games delight you with a great story, but they're also completely free!

What is that loud clatter traveling throughout the forest? Why does the forest seem to be terrified? King Eleon and his loyal troops take one more chance to level the home of numerous forest creatures to the ground. You play as a guardian of the forest named Nerida, and it is your duty to protect the sacred place from the relentless king. There is no need to fight on your own! A team of allies has your back. Maybe you will meet someone who you can become more than friends with... A thrilling hidden-object puzzle adventure is waiting for you!

· SAVOR THE ENTICING STORY FULL OF UNEXPECTED PLOT TWISTS!
Spend your time with pleasure playing story games. Dynamically developing supernatural plot with detective investigations certainly will not leave you indifferent about interactive story games!

· PLAY THIS EPISODE OF THE SERIES TO BE FULLY PREPARED FOR THE NEXT ONE!
Each game is an episode of one big, romantic love story. Make your way through this series, solving riddles and looking for hidden pictures to move on to the next episode and find out what came next in Domini Games.

· MAKE YOUR OWN CHOICES AND SEE WHERE THEY GET YOU. BETTER THINK TWICE!
The player has the ability to choose a character's phrase for an action, the player makes a choice on which action to investigate. Go on a journey and find items to win point & click adventure love story games!

· ENJOY MULTIPLE PICTURESQUE LOCATIONS!
Colorful landscapes and detailed details will make you feel the atmosphere of romance and a charming story of two lovers in our search and find games!

As you progress through the episodes, you'll learn all about the magical forest world and its inhabitants! Finish one series and move on to the next and play for free, but if you feel stuck or don’t want to solve a mini-game, you may buy hints to help you proceed quicker!

-----
